204.description: The resource was successfully created, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The query string is invalid or the request body is missing or malformed.

403.description: Client-generated IDs cannot be used at this endpoint.

404.description: A related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.

422.description: Validation of the request body failed.

ETag.description: A fingerprint of the HTTP response, which can be used in an If-None-Match header to only fetch changes.

head.summary: Retrieves the related empty identity of an individual resource's toOne relationship without returning it.
head.description: Compare the returned ETag HTTP header with an earlier one to determine if the response has changed since it was fetched.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the resource whose related empty identity to retrieve.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: For syntax, see the documentation for the [`filter`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/filtering.html)/[`sort`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/sorting.html)/[`page`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/pagination.html)/[`fields`](https://www.jsonapi.net/usage/reading/sparse-fieldset-selection.html) query string parameters.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: A list of ETags, resulting in HTTP status 304 without a body, if one of them matches the current fingerprint.

ETag.description: A fingerprint of the HTTP response, which can be used in an If-None-Match header to only fetch changes.

Content-Length.description: Size of the HTTP response body, in bytes.

304.description: The fingerprint of the HTTP response matches one of the ETags from the incoming If-None-Match header.

ETag.description: A fingerprint of the HTTP response, which can be used in an If-None-Match header to only fetch changes.

patch.summary: Clears or assigns an existing empty to the toOne relationship of an individual resource.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the resource whose toOne relationship to assign or clear.

requestBody.description: The identity of the empty to assign to the toOne relationship, or `null` to clear the relationship.

204.description: The toOne relationship was successfully updated, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The request body is missing or malformed.

404.description: The resource or a related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.
